pages.text: To ensure a steady supply of food it is beneficial to set up some method of automated food production.$(br2)This can range from automated harvesting to food processing and storage, or all in combination.

pages.title: Mechanical Harvesters
pages.text: One of the simplest automation methods simply uses a rotary arm of Mechanical Harvesters.$(br2)These take advantage of the fact that harvesters will only cut down fully-grown crops, ensuring that none rot in the fields without destroying the half-grown crops.

pages.title: Temperature Control
pages.text: Different crops need different temperature ranges to grow in, and these can be difficult to satisfy year-round with the changing seasons.$(br2)Fortunately, as elevation decreases the ambient temperature becomes more and more stable; first decreasing, then increasing up to about 15c at the bottom of the world.
$(br)Using this, crop planting, growth and harvesting can be fully automated year-round using deployers to plant said crops.

pages.title: Livestock
pages.text: Animals can be farmed automatically in this modpack as well as plants. A simple example of such is auto-shearing a sheep for $(thing)Wool$().$(br2)$(thing)Deployers$() are used for almost every part of the livestock automation process, be it shearing, milking or breeding animals.

pages.title: Familiarising & Breeding
pages.text: Animals are both familiarised and bred by feeding them foods from their respective food groups.$(br2)Each animal can only breed once its familiarity level is above 30%.$(br)$(thing)Deployers$() can both raise familiarity and induce animals to mate.
